bibl.title: The Temple of Jupiter Capitolinus at Arsinoe and the Imperial Cult.
bibl.note: The temple of Jupiter Capitolinus at Arsinoe is known primarily through B.G.U. II, 362. - 1. Introduction. - 2. Organization. - 3. The imperial cult. - 4. The temple of Jupiter Capitolinus and Egypt. - 5. Conclusion.

bibl.seg: GLARE Penelope, The Temple of Jupiter Capitolinus at Arsinoe and the Imperial Cult.
